data.text: “Sɔre, hyerɛn, na wo hann aba,
Hwɛ, sum akata asase so
Amanaman bɛba wo hann no mu,
“Ma wʼani so na hwɛ wo ho hyia:
Afei wobɛhwɛ na wʼanim atew,
Yoma akuwakuw bɛyɛ wʼasase so ma,
Wɔbɛboaboa Kedar nguankuw nyinaa ano abrɛ wo,
“Henanom ne eyinom a wotu sɛ omununkum,
Ampa ara asupɔw no ani da me so;
“Ananafo bɛto wʼafasu no bio,
Wo apon ano bɛdeda hɔ bere biara,
Na ɔman anaa ahenni a wɔrensom wo no bɛyera,
“Lebanon anuonyam bɛba wo nkyɛn,
Wo nhyɛsofo mmabarima bɛba abɛkotow wo;
“Ɛwɔ mu, wɔapa wʼakyi atan wo,
Wobɛnom amanaman nufusu no
Mede sikakɔkɔɔ besi kɔbere anan mu abrɛ wo,
Wɔrente awurukasɛm wɔ wʼasase so bio,
Owia renyɛ wo hann adekyee mu bio
Wo wia rentɔ bio,
Na afei wo nkurɔfo nyinaa bɛyɛ atreneefo
Mo mu akumaa koraa bɛdɔ ayɛ apem,
